test.query: SELECT count() FROM hits_s3 FORMAT Null
SELECT count() FROM hits_s3 WHERE AdvEngineID != 0 FORMAT Null
SELECT sum(AdvEngineID), count(), avg(ResolutionWidth) FROM hits_s3 FORMAT Null
SELECT sum(UserID) FROM hits_s3 FORMAT Null
SELECT uniq(UserID) FROM hits_s3 FORMAT Null
SELECT uniq(SearchPhrase) FROM hits_s3 FORMAT Null
SELECT min(EventDate), max(EventDate) FROM hits_s3 FORMAT Null
SELECT AdvEngineID, count() FROM hits_s3 WHERE AdvEngineID != 0 GROUP BY AdvEngineID ORDER BY count() DESC FORMAT Null
SELECT RegionID, uniq(UserID) AS u FROM hits_s3 GROUP BY RegionID ORDER BY u DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
SELECT RegionID, sum(AdvEngineID), count() AS c, avg(ResolutionWidth), uniq(UserID) FROM hits_s3 GROUP BY RegionID ORDER BY c DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
SELECT MobilePhoneModel, uniq(UserID) AS u FROM hits_s3 WHERE MobilePhoneModel != '' GROUP BY MobilePhoneModel ORDER BY u DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
SELECT MobilePhone, MobilePhoneModel, uniq(UserID) AS u FROM hits_s3 WHERE MobilePhoneModel != '' GROUP BY MobilePhone, MobilePhoneModel ORDER BY u DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
SELECT SearchPhrase, count() AS c FROM hits_s3 WHERE SearchPhrase != '' GROUP BY SearchPhrase ORDER BY c DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
SELECT SearchPhrase, uniq(UserID) AS u FROM hits_s3 WHERE SearchPhrase != '' GROUP BY SearchPhrase ORDER BY u DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
SELECT SearchEngineID, SearchPhrase, count() AS c FROM hits_s3 WHERE SearchPhrase != '' GROUP BY SearchEngineID, SearchPhrase ORDER BY c DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
SELECT UserID, count() FROM hits_s3 GROUP BY UserID ORDER BY count() DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
SELECT UserID, SearchPhrase, count() FROM hits_s3 GROUP BY UserID, SearchPhrase ORDER BY count() DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
SELECT UserID, SearchPhrase, count() FROM hits_s3 GROUP BY UserID, SearchPhrase LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
SELECT UserID, toMinute(EventTime) AS m, SearchPhrase, count() FROM hits_s3 GROUP BY UserID, m, SearchPhrase ORDER BY count() DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
SELECT UserID FROM hits_s3 WHERE UserID = 12345678901234567890 FORMAT Null
SELECT count() FROM hits_s3 WHERE URL LIKE '%metrika%' FORMAT Null
SELECT SearchPhrase, any(URL), count() AS c FROM hits_s3 WHERE URL LIKE '%metrika%' AND SearchPhrase != '' GROUP BY SearchPhrase ORDER BY c DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null

SELECT SearchPhrase, any(URL), any(Title), count() AS c, uniq(UserID) FROM hits_s3 WHERE Title LIKE '%Яндекс%' AND URL NOT LIKE '%.yandex.%' AND SearchPhrase != '' GROUP BY SearchPhrase ORDER BY c DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
SELECT * FROM hits_s3 WHERE URL LIKE '%metrika%' ORDER BY EventTime LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
SELECT SearchPhrase FROM hits_s3 WHERE SearchPhrase != '' ORDER BY EventTime LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
SELECT SearchPhrase FROM hits_s3 WHERE SearchPhrase != '' ORDER BY SearchPhrase LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
SELECT SearchPhrase FROM hits_s3 WHERE SearchPhrase != '' ORDER BY EventTime, SearchPhrase LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
SELECT CounterID, avg(length(URL)) AS l, count() AS c FROM hits_s3 WHERE URL != '' GROUP BY CounterID HAVING c > 100000 ORDER BY l DESC LIMIT 25 FORMAT Null;
SELECT domainWithoutWWW(Referer) AS key, avg(length(Referer)) AS l, count() AS c, any(Referer) FROM hits_s3 WHERE Referer != '' GROUP BY key HAVING c > 100000 ORDER BY l DESC LIMIT 25 FORMAT Null;

SELECT SearchEngineID, ClientIP, count() AS c, sum(Refresh), avg(ResolutionWidth) FROM hits_s3 WHERE SearchPhrase != '' GROUP BY SearchEngineID, ClientIP ORDER BY c DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null;
SELECT WatchID, ClientIP, count() AS c, sum(Refresh), avg(ResolutionWidth) FROM hits_s3 WHERE SearchPhrase != '' GROUP BY WatchID, ClientIP ORDER BY c DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null;
SELECT WatchID, ClientIP, count() AS c, sum(Refresh), avg(ResolutionWidth) FROM hits_s3 GROUP BY WatchID, ClientIP ORDER BY c DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null;
SELECT URL, count() AS c FROM hits_s3 GROUP BY URL ORDER BY c DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null;
SELECT 1, URL, count() AS c FROM hits_s3 GROUP BY 1, URL ORDER BY c DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null;
SELECT ClientIP AS x, x - 1, x - 2, x - 3, count() AS c FROM hits_s3 GROUP BY x, x - 1, x - 2, x - 3 ORDER BY c DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null;
